item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Next. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Robert Caldini
item.dc:creator: haku
item.content:encoded: "Value really gets all of our best work in one place for the entire company to see. It has let us concentrate on the real work, and not on the plumbing."
item.excerpt:encoded: "Value really gets all of our best work in one place for the entire company to see. It has let us concentrate on the real work, and not on the plumbing."
